overview: Massoud Dabir is currently President/CEO of DTEC a Semiconductor Company. Previously from 2000 to 2003 he was Executive VP, COO of Valance Semiconductor. Mr Dabir has over 25 years of Technology sector experience.During 14 years with Seagate, Dabir held several positions in IC design and development.As Seagate’s Executive Director of IC Development, Dabir managed Seagate’s worldwide internal IC development and production, as well as its relationships with its IC vendors.Most recently, he served as Vice President, Strategic Marketing & Technology Development for Marvell Electronics (NASDAQ: MRVL).Previously, he held engineering positions at Memorex Corporation and Bechtel, Group Inc., designing custom integrated circuits.He holds a B.S. in Electrical Engineering from the University of California.
